Item.Risk_Statement: Unauthorized access to information resources is obtained through tapping into inappropriately exposed cabling infrastructure.
Item.Description: The organization protects power equipment and power cabling for the information system from damage and destruction.
Item.Example: Cabling infrastructure is not readily accessible to employees, and/or protected by physical access mechanisms.
Item.Testing_Procedures: Obtain physical and environmental protection policy; procedures addressing power equipment and cabling protection; facility housing power equipment and cabling; other relevant documents or records and ascertain if  the organization protects power equipment and power cabling for the information system from damage and destruction.
